business.name: Toms Solar Brisbane
business.tagline: Brisbane's Premier Solar Installer - Where Quality Meets Excellence

services.title: Residential Solar Installation
services.shortDescription: Power your home with clean energy
services.description: Complete residential solar system installation including premium panels, inverters, and full system design. We handle everything from initial consultation to final connection, ensuring maximum efficiency for your home.

services.title: Commercial Solar Systems
services.description: Large-scale solar solutions for businesses, warehouses, and commercial properties. We design custom systems to maximize your energy savings and provide detailed ROI analysis.

services.title: Battery Storage Solutions
services.shortDescription: Store energy for when you need it
services.description: Tesla Powerwall, Sungrow, and other premium battery systems to store excess solar energy. Use your stored power at night or during blackouts for true energy independence.

services.title: Solar Panel Cleaning
services.description: Professional solar panel cleaning to remove dirt, bird droppings, and debris that reduce system efficiency. Regular cleaning can improve output by up to 30%.

services.title: Solar Repairs & Maintenance
services.shortDescription: Keep your system running at peak performance
services.description: Expert diagnosis and repair of solar system issues including inverter faults, panel damage, and wiring problems. We service all brands and provide comprehensive health checks.

services.title: System Upgrades & Expansions
services.description: Upgrade your existing solar system with more panels, a larger inverter, or add battery storage. We assess your current setup and design the optimal expansion for your needs.

serviceAreas.name: Brisbane
serviceAreas.description: Located in the heart of Brisbane, we're your go-to destination for premium solar installation services.

serviceAreas.name: Brisbane CBD
serviceAreas.description: Serving the Brisbane CBD with exceptional solar installation services.

serviceAreas.name: Surrounding Areas
serviceAreas.description: We proudly serve Brisbane and all surrounding suburbs with professional solar installation services.

faq.question: How much can I save with solar?
faq.answer: Most Brisbane homeowners save 50-80% on their electricity bills. We provide a detailed savings estimate during your free consultation based on your usage patterns.

faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: Most residential installations are completed in 1-2 days. We handle all paperwork and grid connection for you.

faq.question: What warranties do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer 10-year workmanship warranty on all installations, plus manufacturer warranties of 25 years on panels and 10 years on inverters.

faq.question: Do you offer financing?
faq.answer: Yes! We partner with leading finance providers to offer interest-free and low-interest payment plans to make solar affordable for everyone.

faq.question: Are you CEC accredited?
faq.answer: Yes, all our installers are Clean Energy Council (CEC) accredited, which is required for accessing government rebates.

faq.question: What government rebates are available?
faq.answer: Queensland residents can access the federal STC rebate which typically saves $3,000-$5,000 on a standard system. We handle all rebate paperwork for you.

about.title: Brisbane's Most Trusted Solar Installer Since 2021
about.story:
Toms Solar Brisbane was founded in 2021 with a simple mission: to bring world-class solar installation services to Brisbane. After training and working with industry leaders, our founder returned to their hometown to create a business that combines technical excellence with a welcoming, local feel.

Today, our team shares a passion for delivering exceptional results for every client. We've built our reputation on honesty, expertise, and results that speak for themselves.

Whether you need a simple residential system or a complete commercial solution, we're here to help you harness the power of the sun.
about.mission: Our mission is to make clean, renewable solar energy accessible to every Brisbane home and business.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We never stop learning. Our team regularly trains with industry leaders to stay at the forefront of solar technology.

values.title: Honesty
values.description: We'll always give you honest advice about what system is right for your needs and budget.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We're committed to reducing Brisbane's carbon footprint one rooftop at a time.
